data.title: Lagos Central Primary School
data.description: Lagos Central Primary School has been enrolled in our foreign language learning program since 2024. With 450 students across grades 4-6, the school provides daily English and French instruction integrated into the curriculum. The program has shown a 78% improvement in student language comprehension and communication skills.

data.title: Imo State Secondary School
data.description: Imo State Secondary School participates in our comprehensive language program serving 320 students in grades 7-9. The curriculum includes Spanish, German, and advanced English courses. Students have achieved an average 85% pass rate in international language proficiency examinations.

data.title: Port Harcourt International Academy
data.description: Port Harcourt International Academy is a premier institution with 580 students enrolled in our multi-language program. Featuring Mandarin Chinese, Japanese, and Portuguese courses alongside traditional European languages. The school has partnered with 5 international universities for student exchange programs.

data.title: Anambra State High School
data.description: Anambra State High School serves 275 students with structured language education programs. Offering French, Spanish, and German instruction with certified language instructors. The school has established partnerships with native speaker communities for cultural exchange activities.

data.title: Oyo State Bilingual Academy
data.description: Oyo State Bilingual Academy is dedicated to developing multilingual learners with 420 students in our program. Specializing in Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, and English language development. The academy has trained 12 language teachers and maintains immersive learning environments.

data.title: Enugu State Learning Center
data.description: Enugu State Learning Center has enrolled 190 students in our Japanese and Korean language programs. The center features modern language labs, interactive digital learning tools, and monthly language competitions. Students have won 3 regional language proficiency awards.

data.title: Abuja Rural Education Initiative
data.description: Abuja Rural Education Initiative brings language programs to 155 students in remote areas. Providing English, French, and Spanish instruction through hybrid learning models. The program has successfully equipped rural children with essential language skills for higher education opportunities.

data.title: Abia State Language Vocational School
data.description: Abia State Language Vocational School empowers 210 students with practical language skills for career advancement. Featuring Portuguese, Italian, and German instruction combined with professional communication training. Graduates have secured positions with international organizations.

data.title: Ondo State Excellence Academy
data.description: Ondo State Excellence Academy serves 365 students through comprehensive language programs focusing on Arabic, French, and English. The academy emphasizes cultural competency and global communication skills. Students participate in international language competitions and cultural exchange programs annually.
